footer.tagline: Your gateway to the world's most advanced AI models, unified in one intelligent platform.

hero.chatCreateWrite: Chat, create images, write, code, and learn with GPT-4, GPT-5, Claude, Gemini, and more – all from a single platform.

models.heading: Pick the Right AI for Every Task
models.subtitle: Explore the world's leading AI models and start with the one that fits your goal.

models.geminiDescription: Google's most capable AI model for diverse tasks.
models.deepseekDescription: Chinese LLM focused on deep understanding and comprehensive responses.
models.grokDescription: X's rebellious AI with real-time web access and sharp insights.
